infos.value: *Sniffle*
It's high time you ceased that sniveling, Little Leeloo.

You got my name wrong again.
That marks the 7,989th time.
What're you keeping count for!?
Anyway... Do we not have reason enough to be sad?
Both Queen Helena and Sir Owe lie dead!
We all mourn their deaths. Of course we do.
Yet crying for them won't change our situation for the better.
I know that, but...
What we need to do is inform King Oelde of this tragedy. Then we shall run rivers with the blood of Fennes's soldiers.
...Right.
But trekking the whole way through the forest like this...
You wanna say that it's taking too much time, right? I understand how you feel.
But we are being hunted. We cannot afford to make our movements obvious to the enemy.
Hmmm... Well...
What is it?
Hush! I hear...a carriage?
...It's getting closer.
Any thoughts, Little Loola?

For the 7,990th time, that's not my name.
I see 8,000 on the horizon...
But...hmm... Something is strange. The carriage is coming from the other direction, which means...
It can only be headed for Leonis Castle.
...It's come into view.
Hm. Looks like the guard is a mix of Sanctum monks and Hourne soldiers.
I remember... Those two are Xiza and Vistralle.
Hold on. Isn't there something off about that carriage?
Off...?
They're not guarding it at all—they're escorting it. There's no doubt about it.
...Shall we attack?
Seriously? We must report to King Oelde—
I know that! It's just...I'm curious.
They're taking something—or maybe someone—to Leonis Castle.
If we capture that carriage, things may swing in our favor.
It's entirely possible.
...All right. I say we do it.
Then we ambush them and call a swift retreat if we cannot break their ranks.
Got it!
Now, Little Lalee!
You got it wrong again! For the 7,991st time!
